alert.note: Alert for Chippewa (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 31 at 1:55AM CDT until May 31 at 2:15AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CHIPPEWA COUNTY... At 154 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles north of Boyd, or 23 miles northeast of Eau Claire, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Chippewa County, including the following locations... Bateman, Otter Lake and Jim Falls. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
